subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: As the day nears when bicycle teams can unveil new signings, what mystery there is surrounds the biggest fish in the pond: Alberto Contador, at 26 the winner of all three grand Tours.
snippet: As the day nears when bicycle teams can unveil new signings, what mystery there is surrounds the biggest fish in the pond: Alberto Contador, at 26 the winner of all three grand Tours.
